name: We Go Home !
description:
This game allows you play with the gravity in a dynamic space environnement thanks to a point based physics engine written during the jam.

Go through the levels to help blobs going back to their home planet by joining elements and anticipate the reaction of the physics system.

This game was made during the 48 hours Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2021 whose theme was "joigned together".

The team :
- Fsa : programming, physics engine & arts
- Sir Blaster : programming & arts
  https://sir-blaster.itch.io/

Additional credits :
- Music by Andrey Sitkov (https://soundcloud.com/andrey-sitkov)
- Planet base textures from www.solarsystemscope.com/textures/
- Satellite model by Angi (https://archibaseplanet.com/download/70305752.html)
- Asteroid model by slapsam101 (https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/3d-model-asteroid-floating-space-1301373)
- Other space textures from the NASA
